crypto.name: human server
crypto.desc:
Ever since everyone left WhatsApp, we've been overwhelmed by new users. We've teamed up with UnionCTF to get some humans working while our servers take a break.

You'll be helping our users send flags to each other, but as we've ensured messages are E2E encrypted with state-of-the-art military-grade encryption, their messages will be private. Our customers have nothing to worry about.

crypto.name: mordell primes
crypto.desc: I found one rational point on an elliptic curve, so there's infinite number of rational solutions. This means I can pick from an infinite number of primes... right?

crypto.name: neoclassical
crypto.desc: We've developed a Neo key exchange protocol by developing a new group operation for lists.

crypto.name: why is a raven
crypto.desc:
..like a writing desk?

I haven't the slightest idea! But maybe Alice and Bob do?

pwn.name: babyrarf
pwn.desc: Kill the rarf boss, get the flag.

pwn.name: notepad
pwn.desc: Here's a cool notepad! We heard that Bjarne Stroustrup himself uses it to manage his notes. Does that make it... notepad++?

pwn.name: nutty
pwn.desc: My favourite part of a nut? The kernel.

rev.name: aesthetic
rev.desc:
The challenge binary implements standard AES-128-ECB encryption. Unfortunately, the code is rather unaesthetic. Can you help?

When I used it to encrypt the flag, the output was: bc7187a93571e8127efb60589f6d6c82

rev.name: antistatic
rev.desc: Heisenberg's uncertainty principle also applies to CTF. Please do not observe my crackme, otherwise you may change its behavior!

rev.name: exah
rev.desc: Have you tried reversing Haxe macros?

rev.name: unionware
rev.desc:
My mom ran something on her computer and encrypted some important files!

Can you recover them for me?

DISCLAIMER: This is functioning malware, make sure to exercise care and run this in a VM.

web.name: Cr0wnAir
web.desc:
Cr0wn is getting into the airline business to make some sweet profits when everyone is able to travel again. Can you upgrade your trip?

Loosely inspired by https://darknetdiaries.com/episode/84/ (has nothing to do with solving the challenge)
